title: Man and girlfriend file teeth to a point, worship Satan, DEAD bodies in the backyard.
itunes:title: Man and girlfriend file teeth to a point, worship Satan, DEAD bodies in the backyard.
description:
It is well-known in Pazuzu Algarad's North Carolina notorious in his neighborhood that he and his girlfriend are drug-addled Satanists. In 2014, Algarad and his girlfriend, Amber Burch, are arrested and charged with murder when police find human remains behind their Knob Hill home.

Joining Nancy Grace today:

  • Ken Belkin - NY criminal defense attorney
  • Dr. Kendall Crowns - Pathologist, Deputy ME Travis County Texas
  • Steven Lampley -Former Detective, author 'Outside Your Door'
  • Dr. Caryn Stark - Psychologist
  • Levi Page - Crime Online Investigative Reporter

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
